about_the_game:
Train simulator: A Journey Through Time


Step into the golden age of railroads, manage your own train, and explore meticulously designed, breathtaking landscapes. Customize and upgrade your train to offer your passengers unique comfort and luxury.

Dynamic Railway Management Experience


Engage in various activities, from signing lucrative contracts to transporting goods between bustling stations. Personalize your carriages, enhance your train's functionality, and provide excellent service to satisfy your passengers.

Captivating Visuals and Relaxing Atmosphere


Immerse yourself in a world full of beautiful scenery and a relaxing atmosphere. Travel through forests, vast plains, mountain slopes, and snowy terrains. No matter what environment you travel through, the beauty of your journey will always be with you.

Develop and expand Your Business


Sign contracts, transport goods, and wisely use your resources to grow your business. Purchase new carriages, improve your train's capabilities, and provide your passengers with an unforgettable travel experience. With each successful delivery, you'll earn the money and prestige needed to advance your career and unlock new opportunities.

Create Your Perfect Train


From the color of the carriages to the interior decoration, Train Simulator allows you to customize your train according to your unique style. Enhance the passenger experience with various services and amenities to make each journey as comfortable and enjoyable as possible.

Join the Adventure


Take on the role of a train conductor and create a legend in Train Simulator. With engaging gameplay, stunning visuals, and a relaxing atmosphere, this game promises an unforgettable train experience. Your journey to becoming a legendary train operator starts here.

name: Train Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz or Ryzen 3xxx
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (recent generation)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1070 or better 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: At the end of the 1800s, make a difference in the railway industry with your own train. Customize your train and offer luxury and comfort to your passengers. Grow your business with interstation travels, profitable contracts, and new wagons. A relaxing and enjoyable adventure awaits you.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish
